channel.title: burnout on Ross A. Baker
channel.description: Recent content in burnout on Ross A. Baker

item.description: It's not the repeated accusations of racism from people who don't know my life that burn me out. I can easily file that away next to my monad transformers getting blamed for global warming. But have you never been stuck working with such people? Would you do so for free? When you demand it of your maintainers, *that's* how the joie de OSS dies. I have repeatedly seen it from the outside, and I feel it on the inside.
That abrupt, sad fizzling sound an exhausted can makes when painting the soccer fields is my new theme music. #Burnout
